item.description:
Parker Wheeler's Blues Party at The Grog in Newburyport will feature Matt Stubbs, Ken Clark and Johnny BlueHorn with Amadee Castenell, Marc Hickox and Chris Rivelli on Sunday, January 6.

Cover: $7

Come join us at 6PM for an evening of live music and dancing, and enjoy a drink or two to close the weekend on the right note and with lots of energy. Hope to see you there!

Instructions to find us: Walk inside the Grog and go left around the bar. There will be a guy sitting on a stool at the top of a staircase. Give him your money and let him stamp your hand. Go downstairs. We usually hang around near the dance floor.

The Grog's website: http://thegrog.com/

Matt Stubbs: http://www.matthewstubbs.net
item.how_to_find_us: Pay the cover, go downstairs and look for me. I look like my pic.
item.name: Parker Wheeler's Blues Party at The Grog featuring Matt Stubbs
